base_description: Black rectangular cabinet with glass doors.
part_description: Two glass-paneled doors, rectangular shape, centrally positioned, symmetrical design.
internal_interaction_description: The cabinet doors are hinged, allowing them to swing open and closed. The glass panels are set within wooden frames, providing visibility into the cabinet's interior. The doors meet at the center, likely with a locking mechanism to keep them closed securely.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or in a room, used for storage or display. Its glass doors allow visibility of contents, interacting with light to showcase items inside. Users can open the doors to access or organize the stored items.
